fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Leader: If you have more than 2 Soldiers, you have +1 Hand Size for each Soldier you have above 2. 
- Heir’s Gambit: If there are currently more True non-Orders than there are Order, gain a Special card of your choice. Activates once.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Command: Create a 1 HP, 3 Hand Size, 1 Channel Soldier. It draws 2 cards a phase. You control its card plays and channel creation, but see below for limitations. It will not appear on the playerlist nor can it be directly targeted. Gains a use every 3 players you Kill. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3] 
- Arms: Change a card in your Hand into a non-Special Attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 uses, Recharging, 0/3]

*Solider: Your Soldier can ONLY play cards/open channels. They may not enter Rooms with you. Trades/whispers created will appear to come from you. You may trade freely from your Hand or your Soldier’s. Your Soldiers will not be affected by Event draw increases. Your Soldiers will disappear after 6 phases. Additionally, your Soldiers Die when you die.*
